Messages.Author: Charleen Kolpinski
Messages.Content: Dear students, this is a reminder that we will have a digital info session tomorrow, Tuesday 9th of April, at 3PM (sharp). I will first present the most relevant information regarding the Micro-Credential about it's structure, your opportunities, etc. Afterwards, you can ask your questions. You can participate if you are already registered or if you are still thinking about registering.    Dial-in link: https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/68035850105?pwd=ZDEzZVUwdnYwbXU0cXpCK2JycTBhZz09  Meeting-ID: 680 3585 0105, Kenncode: 936182 Hope to get to know you on Tuesday! Best regards Charleen
